episodes.title: How did Sean "Diddy" Combs react when he heard his sentencing?
episodes.description:
Sean "Diddy" Combs was sentenced to more than four years in prison. Over the summer, the music mogul had been found guilty of prostitution-related charges. CBS News legal reporter Katrina Kaufman has more from New York.

episodes.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs sentenced to 50 months in prison for prostitution-related charges | full coverage
episodes.description:
Sean "Diddy" Combs was sentenced to 50 months, or four years and two months, in prison for two counts of transportation to engage in prostitution. 

#news #diddy #breakingnews

episodes.title: Russell Brand charged with multiple counts of rape, sexual assault in U.K.
episodes.description:
Comedian and actor Russell Brand has been charged in the U.K. with several counts related to rape and sexual assault allegations, London's Metropolitan Police announced. This comes after claims by four women emerged in 2023. CBS News' Holly Williams reports.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell's Arizona trial begins for ex-husband's death
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell, the "Doomsday mom" sentenced to life in prison for killing her children, is in court for the Arizona trial surrounding her fourth husband's death. CBS News' Andres Gutierrez reports.

episodes.title: What led to ex-Abercrombie CEO Mike Jeffries' sex trafficking charges?
episodes.description:
The former CEO of clothing retailer Abercrombie & Fitch has been arrested on federal sex trafficking and interstate prostitution charges. Mike Jeffries, his partner and a third associate are accused of recruiting young men under the guise of modeling opportunities and coercing them to perform sex acts. BBC News investigations correspondent Rianna Croxford breaks down the case.
